title: (x) Artistas de Fashionista - Matrix Script {Dav}
content:
I could only get this small sample but i’m sure someone here will identify it. If not identified i would like suggestions of typefaces with this spirit and hopefully an ‘inverted 3’ uppercase E.

Thanks in advance for the feedback.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [identify.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=identify.gif) | 2.69 KB |
author: arena

comments.content:
‘ [Matrix Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112173226/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=138)’, _by [Zuzana Licko](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Zuzana%20Licko)_..

_( A classy alternate may be ‘ [Eplica](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112173226/http:/www.letraset.com/eu/template1a.asp?catid=73&id=444)’, by [Yvonne Diedrich](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112173226/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2001Results/Eplica.html).. )_

I knew it was a familiar face, how could i not realized it was Matrix script!  
Thanks formlos.

An equally classy alternative is [RXC](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Rodrigo%20Cavazos)’s yummy italic for [Eidetic Neo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112173226/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PEidBI.html)
